sentences.sentence: My first job was working at the Ukiah Library when I was 16 years old. It was a dream job and I did everything from shelving books to reading to the children for story time.
sentences.translation: 我的第一份工作是16岁时在尤基亚图书馆工作。那是一份理想的工作，我做过很多事情，从整理书籍到给孩子们读故事不等。

sentences.sentence: Image above: This is our messy shelving in the studio.
sentences.translation: 上图：这是工作室里面乱糟糟的架子。

sentences.sentence: Now shelving and storage units are being snapped up.
sentences.translation: 现在，人们又在纷纷抢购储物架和存储柜。
